评论详情: I have 3 pairs in different colors. Extremely comfortable and flattering. The quality is great. My first 2 pairs I bought a couple of years ago and they still look basically new. No fading or pilling.

评论概述: Holy moly! My new go to pant!
评论详情: When ordering I was bothered by a review saying “baggy”, however I ordered anyway and wow! Perfect fit for me! For reference I’m 5.9 and 135lbs ordered a medium. The bottom of the legs are tapered and the thighs are looser not baggy and the top is perfectly flat and tailored to your waist. They don’t look like leggings they actually look like jogging pants which they are. Would absolutely buy again and tend to do so after the holidays!

I purchased these yoda pants for someone else and they did not like the material, so I kept them for myself! What I like about these pants are that they you can wear them as casual-professional pants or just to lounge around in. The look very nice as a dressy style, but comfy enough to where as sweat pants. Size was accurate. Just know, they are not the same materials as regular sweatpants or sweat shirt material.
These pants are simply perfect. They are made with quality material and fit great.  I plan to purchase more pairs! Color matches what is pictured. So comfortable and hold up in the wash.

I got these to wear on the airplane and to have a pant option if we went hiking on a recent trip to Croatia. They are SO comfortable and flattering. The fit is great, the waistband doesn't roll or slide down, and the pockets are deep enough to actually be useful. They're a comfortable material and weight for mild weather. The only thing I don't like is that they don't offer more colors in my size!

Wanted to warn other lovelies who love a nice, flattering jogger - these did not do it for me - the butt fit was great, the stomach high rise, great! BUT...the fabric in the inner thigh area gets "bunchy" almost as if there's extra fabric(?) and it's not flattering at all. I really wanted to love them, but had to return.  Again, the colors are so great!

I purchased these specifically to ride on a long haul flight to Italy so I would be comfortable. They were perfect. They were not binding in the waist. They were comfortable they wash well they dry well they don’t shrink and they have pockets which was very important for me I love them

I love these pants for exercising at the gym. They don’t slide down, comfortable , fit well, have nice pockets & are easy to wash but the only negative is they can’t be dried in the dryer & you have to hang them to dry. They are shiny & a nice weight.
I've had these pants for about 2 years now and they are still in great shape. Very comfortable and medium-thick material, great for the colder months.

My co-worker had purchased a pair and loved them. I decided to try a pair. I am IN LOVE! They are so comfortable. They are not to thick or to thin. I already have more i. different colors to purchase. Buy them, you won't regret it!
These are soft but they fit too tight. I could return and size up, but for the price, I found others I liked better.

评论用户: Received order and one shirt was the wrong color without any customization .  Lost money on that !!!
评论详情: True to size ; great fit
Super comfortable. Washes great.  Can be dressed up or down. Love these pants!

评论概述: Great for curves - Better than UA and Nike
评论详情: Better than UA and Nike for curvy women. Buy 1 size up for hips/behind room. Finally found activewear pants that fit my curvy figure. Squat proof too. Will see how it holds up overtime.
I wear business casual most days. These have been awesome during pregnancy and post. They look nicer than regular joggers but feel so comfy. I have multiple colors lol

评论概述: These were exactly what I needed.
评论详情: These joggers are great for exercising and just walking.  I am not a runner but am very happy with them.

I love the pants, except, the narrow strand of elastic at the top of the waist band! They advertise a wide band and there is a nice wind band (with a thin piece of elastic all around the top inside the wide band) and I hate it! They are made of nice soft material and they look really nice.

We were expecting an absorbant cotton blend like sweat pants, but these are NOT that. They are the same thin, slick, polyamide/spandex as a lot of yoga pants and we were disappointed. That said, we liked the fit. We have long, thin legs, so they are a little loose in the thighs (curvy girls might like that) but we are pleased at how long they are, like all the way to our feet and we have to tug them over our heels long. Long-legged ladies will understand how rare that is! They look nice enough to wear out of the house with a cute top, maybe even to a casual restaurant and they're wrinkle-resistant. We haven't washed them yet, but we don't expect them to shrink, although over time and many washings the spandex could stretch out like it sometimes does so we probably will always dry them on avery low heat setting. We're keeping them, but still looking for something similar in a cotton blend.
fit well

评论概述: Cute but not what I was looking for
评论详情: If you're looking for a "slinky" type material, these joggers will probably be a good choice. I am personally looking for more of a sweat pant/fleece material so I decided to return them. They were comfortable and as flattering as joggers can be (I mean, all joggers are going to give you a rather ice cream cone shape) and probably would work well as active wear and lounge wear. Would have kept if I didn't already have a ton of pants in this type of material.
I find these are the perfect jogger for lounging or for light workouts. The material feels great and they can be dressed up or down. Each pair has held up well over time and frequent washing.
I love these pants, a perfect fit and a good price!  This is my second pair!

These are my favorite pants right now.  Flattering and comfortable enough to sleep in.  Pockets easily hold my cell phone.  They are about the only pants I feel comfortable tucking a shirt into because they kind of hide my extra tummy.For my first order, I accidentally ordered an extra small in black (size recommended based on orders I placed for my daughter).  She loved them and we ordered the camo for her as well.  It is a nice dark camo that isn't flashy but a bit more exciting than plain black.  She is 5'2", 100lbs and the XS fit her perfect.I ordered the large and they fit me perfectly as well.  I'm 5'6", 165 lbs and pear-shaped with left over tummy from a twin pregnancy.

The pants are super comfortable and soft. Fabric keeps me warm but not hot. Great for traveling or lounging. Even though I usually buy petite, the length is not a problem because it is slim fit and gathers at the ankle.  While the pants are casual, they can be dressed up with a top or jacket. I bought a medium and small. They both work, but I prefer a little more form fitting, so I’ll go with small in the future.

I'll probably need to lose some weight to really like these pants. I've gained a lot of weight pretty quickly because there's a shortage with my medication. I'm usually a medium weighing between 145 and 150 lbs at 5'6" so that's what I bought. It was my mistake for not weighing myself before purchasing the pants. Currently I'm 157lbs and though the medium feels comfy and not too tight, It does show off my cellulite on my butt and upper thighs.  If you're my weight and height with very little to no cellulite in these areas, a medium will probably look great on you. Just keep in mind it still won't have as baggy of a look as on the model If you have thicker hips and thighs. If this was my normal weight, I would return the medium for a large as I'm pretty sure that would give me a much better fit and hide the areas I'm self-conscious about. I took a star off because I personally did not like the hemming of the pockets. They stand out a lot more in person while in the pictures, they appeared smoother and less noticeable.  Overall, they seem like nice soft comfy pants. I haven't ran in them or washed them yet so I cannot comment on the durability and whether or not they pill.

评论概述: Cute but not a good fit for wider hips
评论详情: The fabric is soft and comfortable but the fit/style of the pants was not a good match for my body. It was tighter at my hips and pulled tight at my crotch in an unflattering way that made me feel uncomfortable to wear them out of the house. I would have returned or exchanged them for another size but I missed the return window 🙈.
These have become my favorite pants. Wash nicely, very comfortable, get lots of compliments when I wear them. I have 4 pair now. Highly recommend!

I just received my sixth pair. I originally bought them for golf but I wear them all the time now. Light, versatile and very comfortable. Wash beautifully. I fluff dry and then hang to dry.  The waistband is like yoga pants, that the best thing about these pants. Love them.

评论概述: Good for those with flat stomachs
评论详情: I weight train 4 days a week. I am 5’6” and 128 lbs. However, I have had 4 kids and I am currently on antibiotics that make me bloat. These joggers are comfortable EXCEPT the waist band is a thin elastic at the very top and it digs in when my stomach is bloated. It is uncomfortable and unflattering. I bought some more expensive ones from athleta and the waist band is wide and compressing and I prefer them.
I wear these on fitness days at school. They are comfortable, wash up nicely (I air dry) and have held up to all the crawling around and chasing for year olds entail.

Bought a couple pairs for myself & recent purchase was for my neice. Great waistband is not restrictive or narrow, a total comfort to wear all day and love the pockets in front. Nice color selection but love the standard dark gray. Will purchase again!

I have a pair of similar leggings I bought from a department store brand.  Comparatively, these are a much better price but fabric feels cheaper, not as soft, and the overall fit is not ideal.  For me I find the waist fits tighter although it does a pretty good job of smoothing things out and the legs are less of a legging and more of a loose sweat pant.  I'd like something in between.

评论概述: One half of my daytime pajamas
评论详情: Ever since lockdown, I've spent considerable time in comfortable pants, usually athletic leisurewear. I've tried a lot of different pants, and these are my favorite ... so much so that I've ordered these in three different colors, and I may order them in a few more.  I really like the fit. The high waist hides/covers your belly (if you have one), and then the fabric drapes really nicely over your bum and, then, gather at your ankles evenly. The picture is a very accurate representation of how these fit. They have great stretch and move great with you!
This is the 3rd one I have ordered. The fit is true to size, it washes wonderfully and I love the comfortable fit.
The pants are good quality and the fit is good.

Very comfortable and versatile pant. Great for travel. This is my third pair (black, navy, dark gray) and the only negative was the baggy fit of one pair. I returned those and ordered another. Those fit fine.

Absolutely love these joggers. Great quality for the price, they last a long time. Bought my first pair in 2020 and I’d say I wear these at least a few days a month. I wear them for WFH, to the gym, to run errands etc. They have finally fallen apart and I just bought a new pair. Has a great tummy control band on top as well.  I’m 5’3”, 145 lbs and a pear shape. I wear a medium and can confirm the black, green and maroon colors are NOT see through. The band at the ankle hits right at my ankle so a good length for my fellow shawties.

I own several pairs of the pant. They are the most comfortable pants I've ever worn. They are very soft, look nice on, and are well made. True to size on the fit. They are a thin material which makes them a good choice for summer. I hope they come out with some in this same fabric but thicker or heavier for colder weather. Try them, you won't be disappointed!!!
These are very soft and comfortable , baggy in the hip and thighs then tapers at the ankle. Love that they dry quickly when air dried. Perfect for travelingi.
Love the fit and fabric.  Great fit without being clingy.
Second pair I bought but these are a bit shorter than my camo pair.  I prefer the longer one.

The pants are ok overall but the inseam is uncomfortable in between the legs in the girl area. Maybe if I lose some weight they will be less tight. I’m 5’5”, ~135 lbs, and got a small. The small is roomy enough and not tight it’s just that one area that is not good.
These fit perfectly! They are not thick what so ever. So they are more for spring summer and early fall!

These pants are very comfortable. They are not tight like leggings. And they have nice pockets on each side with a good waistband that doesn’t roll down or fall down. They have plenty of room but are not tight fitting. And they are a good length for petite/short women, especially with the cuff which is not tight either have ordered a second pair in the gray. I know I will wear them for the rest of the cold weather this year and then enjoy them starting in the fall. They are warm but not thick. I am 5‘2“, and the length is fine for me I like my cold weather pants to be all the way past my ankles and not cropped at all and not ankle length. These are great.
These fit great and I like the material. The high waisted band gives some tummy control. It did snag on one spot but hasn't done it again.

评论概述: So happy with my new Dragon Fit Joggers!
评论详情: I hear about Dragon Fit Joggers on Good Morning America, and immediately looked them up on Amazon and ordered a pair I got an XXL, because I don't like wearing tight pants unless it's for exercise class. I'm 5'3" and currently weight somewhere around 180-184 lbs. The length is fine for my short legs. I have fabric sensitivity (I can't stand wearing those buttery soft jersey knit leggings!) and get hot very easily, so I've tried countless jogger-type pants in search of the one that is cool-to--the-touch to wear, not too tight against my skin, semi-flattering (as much as possible), and appropriate for various activities. Welp, I hit paydirt on these Dragonfit Joggers. These just about the most comfortable joggers I have EVER tried on or worn. I am so glad I heard about these moderately priced, incredibly comfortable, pants. My goal is to order the XL soon as I resume my weight loss journey.....again!!!
Super comfy and lightweight and fit while pregnant which is a plus! Definitely shows more wear with each wash, but for the price, good quality!

I loved these and want another pair I was trying to exchange them. Instead of return them but I want another pair of them, they were snagged and damaged. Can you send me another pair in medium black not snagged?

Being that it’s called a jogger, I assumed it would be made of soft, cotton-like material. Not at all! It’s more like a Lycra-y, yoga pant type material. My fault for not paying more attention. Having said that, I like them! I could even see dressing them up with heels and wearing to work or out for the evening.

评论概述: Color is off from photo but Great fit and quality
评论详情: I really like the fit and quality of the joggers.  I usually wear a 4 or 6 in LuluL....n and the Medium fit perfect.  I am 5'6"ish and they come right to ankles. Everything about them is great. My only complaint is the blue green color is not the same as shown online.  They are way more of a medium blue with a hint of green.  The photo looks more like a deep green with a hint of blue.  Oh well still nice. May purchase a second pair.

These pants are not what I expected. They are so big I had to double check my order and tag to ensure I didn't buy them in a much larger size. While the loose fit leg is comfortable, the waistband does not compress my tummy like advertised. The positive is that the color is fabulous!

评论概述: LOve these pants, have worn this style for years
评论详情: Ordered my first two pairs a couple of years ago, love them.  They are my go-to pants, wear well, fit nicely, not too skinny.  Wear with nice tops or tees.  Ordered two more colors.  Good for travel or wearing around town.

These are even more comfortable than leggings! I can stretch and dance in them just as easily, AND walk right out of a class and into a restaurant w/o feeling underdressed or making sure I’ve got my bootie covered. Not as heavy as sweats, so they’re not too warm to wear when being active! Now I want to buy other colors!
These pants seem to be nice quality and a good fit. I haven’t washed them yet. I have tried them on. I plan to keep them unless I have an issue after washing.
I actually purchased these for my adding mom. They look great and are easy for her to pull up! Very comfortable!

评论概述: Just as comfy as Gmail said
评论详情: I bought these to try as one of 3 ( the least expensive) pairs recommended on GMA . I rarely do it but wanted a good affordable pair of this type. They live up to the reputation.  Very comfortable  stretchy but not so much even roll and bump shows thru. Versatile  good for gym or to wear out casually.  Not see thru won't shrink.  Loving them
Una vez que mandan el pantalon correcto esta bastante bien y comodo

I gave these a 4 only because they  don't come in petite. These are awesome, the fabric, are great. They look like they will last. They launder easily. My only complaint is they are long. Other than that, I recommend them.

I bought my first pair of these joggers a few years ago. Now, as various leggings wear out, I'm only replacing them with these joggers. They are definitely equivalent to the Lululemon ones that are similar, but at a fraction of the price. I now own the olive, black, navy and most recently, black camo. I love every pair and wear them to yoga or just running errands around town.

Love the high waist, makes for a nice smooth fit. Fabric is very soft and light weight. I am 5‘6“ and wear a medium, which fits great, but still a little shorter in length than I like. But it seems most of the joggers are.  These are my favorite joggers so far and I plan to travel in them soon.

I bought these as pants to wear for work as I needed a bit more stretch and comfort than my previous pants. They do run a little large for me but that's okay. They are super stretchy and cooling and I would honestly use them as lounge pants if I didn't use them for work. The ankle cuffs aren't as tight as I like so I roll them up a bit whenever I wear them. Other than that, really nice! I think these would also be nice to wear as workout pants in the spring or summer as they are light and breezy. Would definitely buy again.

These were a gift for my mom who is so hard to buy for that I am the only one in the family to buy her workout clothes.  This is the first time she has requested a second purchase and she has even bought them as gifts for friends.  She says she loves the look and feels comfortable wearing them after class to go shopping or have lunch with friends.  She also says that they are very comfortable and don't make her feel hot when she is working out.  She just dropped a hint the other day that she wouldn't mind having these in a darker color if I was starting to shop for Christmas=)
This joggers look great not only for exercise but also very casual to run errands. They are comfortable. The material is thick and they do not wrinkle giving them a clean look. They also fit me well!

The material is very soft and comfortable to move around in, but the fit is terrible fir my body type. I am 5'4" medium and range between 145 and 155. I wanted something more conservative but I feel like it's more revealing but not in a flattering way. I don't know how to describe it and i have an athletic build lol idk. Might post a picture but I have to think about it. So while I won't wear it to the gym, I am keeping it because it makes comfy sleeping pants. Still worth the money even though I won't be using it as intended.

Why?  Because they are slim fitting without being a second skin showing every curve and parts of your body you'd rather not show.  They are high-waisted and don't fall down on  me, which has been the problem of nearly every other workout pant I've purchased, including name brands we're all familiar with.  They are sturdy without being heavy.  They have pockets where you can put a kleenex so you're not wiping your nose with the towels the gym provides.  And best of all they are less than $30 unlike name brands which want anywhere from $59 to $99 for a cheaply made pair of workout pants that don't even stay up.  I love the relaxed fit of the jogger style, relaxed but not at all baggy.  They are perfect and I love them and it's basically all I wear.
This pants fit great.  They fit like my lulu’s. What I like about the lulu’s is they don’t shine.  These shine.  It’s the reason why I gave it 4 stars.
These are some nice looking pants! A friend had some and let me try them on and I was sold. Bought 3 pair and they feel and look great. They can go dressy or casual. Fit well and I love them!

评论概述: that they are light weight and have a dressy look to them if you want that to be your look,
评论详情: I really like these pants and I did not wear them during the summer but I have worn the green ones 3 times at short periods of time and the entire back side is all nubby and and rough.  I would like to return and have a new pair sent to me.  I did pay a good amount for these and I really like them but I cant wear them now.  I also have a black pair which I just took the tag off.. can someone in customer service please respond to me as to how I can return these and a new pair sent to me free of charge.  They are comfortable but the back end is all ratted.  My email is woodymk@yahoo.com.  I sure need help with this item.  Thank you for your time to help me with this product.  Karen Woodhouse. I will be waiting to hear from you.  10-21-2022

So happy with this item that I just ordered it in two more colors. I love how high the waist is - it lets me feel snug and cinched while keeping the crotch area comfortable as well. It snugs nicely around the butt to be flattering, while also feeling loose enough to be comfortable and feel a littel more put together than tight yoga pants. Ordered medium and length is absolutely perfect (I'm 5'1").
I am 5’ 5” and whilst they fit very well for my smaller size, they are an inch or so too short. Quite the ankle freezer when it is cold. They are otherwise great pants.

I'm on the thicker side. My office does sweat pant Friday's on occasion but everyone wears yoga pants.  I'm not as comfortable showing every crevice of my back side at work. These are fitting enough but relaxed and not skin tight. Also i don't feel like I'm dressed too down.

评论概述: Did not realize a simple pair of joggers could look so amazing
评论详情: These joggers are super comfy, and they're long enough for my long-ish legs. I ordered a medium in hopes of having more length and I am really glad I did!  They're perfect. It's so bizarre how many compliments I've gotten when I wear these joggers. ( even my 20 yr old college son said I should wear joggers more often :-0) So I ordered 2 more pair ;) BTW I'm 5'6" and about 125 lbs so a medium really fits well, not too loose but definitely not tight. The light blue are the ones that get attention, not sure why.. ?? I love the dark blue and the black ones are ideal for a walk w/ the pup or even a trip to the store. Would I buy again? I already did!

These are NOT dress pants. The material is 100% athletic wear! I’ve seen a few reviews passing these off as dress pants/ work pants which is why I purchased them. THEY ARE NOT! The material is 100% Yoga pant material in a lose jogger fitting. This is not something that looks cute/appropriate in person with a sweater or dress shirt. Unless you’re doing a zoom meeting where they see top up, don’t purchase for work or to be dressy :) .  These are super cute on to wear as athletic wear. For that, I recommend! True to size & very comfortable! I purchased in black & green!

评论概述: Nice - so many uses, dress up or casual
评论详情: These fit great, resist wrinkling, true to size and they wash very well.  I have now bought 4 pair. Nicer to be able to switch away from leggings for a change. Material is good & not clingy.

These are so soft and comfortable and true to size. When I first took them out of the package, I was doubtful about size and comfort. Size is perfect. So soft, so comfortable. I’m putting a second pair in the cart. Hopefully, I’ll be just as pleased with the second pair. It’s not always the case.
Very good quality and lulu dupe. I got the smallest size (in AE jeans I’m a 00) and they’re quite bit. Not the fit I was aiming for but they’re so comfy I’m keeping them.

评论概述: Amazed at the fit and comfort!
评论详情: I bought these not really expecting to love them so much! Figured they'd be great for just lounging around the house or running quick errands - and they are that, buuuuuut they have also become a STAPLE in my workout collection! Comfy, buttery (legit!) soft material that hugs alllll the right areas (like the thighs and booty) but a bit looser in the knees and calves - so they're basically like looser leggings LOL. Anyway, I'm pretty muscular in those key areas so I guess if you have a leaner frame they could hang/sag on you a bit more, but just make sure you follow the sizing chart, because the chart was pretty on point for me. The material itself like I said is buttery soft but it is lightweight so I wouldn't call these "winter" friendly if you're going to wear them outdoors during that season. The crotch doesn't sag at all for me & is very comfy at the waist - not tight/digging but also does not fall/slide down. Overall, you will NOT regret buying these. They may not be sweat pant joggers but they'll sure make you either wanna sit and watch Netflix on the couch all day or assist you doing squats for days in the gym! VERSATILE to say the least.

评论概述: Great material that doesn’t show imperfections
评论详情: Purchased a small. I’m 5’8 1/2” and 135#. Hips measure 37”. I wear a small to medium in Athleta brand of this helps. Pants are not thin which is nice. Taking them out of the package they looked sooo small at the hips but stretchy material so they actually fit. Look slightly snugger than model and a little shorter. I got the longer style. Ordering the grey next but may try a medium. The only slightly loose area is behind the knee. Otherwise fits more like leggings if this is how you want them. I’d go medium if you want anything looser.  Addendum : wanted to try the grey and blue but only a size large left. Believe it or not they fit too but just looser in the legs like the model. I usually like a 32” inseam and wish these were longer. Hit about 3-4” above the ankle like 7/8 leggings. I’ll have to bring back the scrunchy sock trend of the 80’s if I want to wear these in the winter!  Another addendum: the largest kept slipping down so gave them to a friend. Ordered a medium in the graffiti and the olive green. Different material than the other black cameo ones. Fit a lot looser in the front area where a pant zipper would be and not as compressive of a material. Don’t expect that different colors will be the same material I guess. The grey large that I had were kind of shiny but not baggy in the zipper area and they were a size bigger!

I love these pants.  Have 3 pair in 3 different colors.  I’ll never purchase a $110 pair of whatever brand everyone talks about.  These are comfy and I get a ton  of compliments on them.  Best $30 I’ve ever spent for a pair of pants.  They wash up so easy.

I bought two pair of these pants. One pair fit perfectly. The other one was to tight in the waist. I will be returning that pair. The pair that fit looked nice. They were comfortable. My husband made a positive comment about how they looked on me without me having to ask him what he thought.

评论概述: I got my size and these fit like leggings … not the loose tapered sweatpants
评论详情: Bruh… I got my size (Large, I am a size 10) and they fit like leggings on me. I thought these were going to be loose tapered sweat pants like shown in the picture. They don’t fit like shown in the picture at all. The fabric is also very thin and silky, not what I was expecting at all. The seller should do a better job of advertising the appearance and description more accurately - now I have to spend time doing a return for this item. I also found them to be more snug around the belly than I was comfortable with, I would not call these comfortable at all.
I have bought about 6 pair of these joggers! Love them!
Had I been able to order this article in petite sizes I would have given it 5 stars.  So I’m forced to say it’s Almost perfect.  Please consider providing petite sizes for us shorties.

These joggers are just great! The material and fit are just perfect for me. I'm 5'7" and ordered the XXL in black (only color in that size available). They are not too tight and feel fantastic. I ordered another pair by different brand and will be returning them because they are not even close to the quality of this pair of joggers. Also, you can easily dress them up or down and they look great. I do hope these joggers will be available in different colors in size XXL. Currently, they are only available in black in that size.
These are so comfortable I now have  4 pairs. Talked my mom into trying them. Now she only wears these! They feel so nice
These are comfortable and they feel nice next to the skin.  However I won't be wearing them for awhile now because polyester is too hot for Florida.  They launder well.
Fits very big

I like these joggers for the gym.  A thicker fabric than leggings, I feel covered.  Flattering fit, excellent length (5’6”).  The rise is above the stomach below the belly button.  Wash well and no peeling/fade after dozens of washes.

These pants are amazing. I’m 5’8” and they fit just above the ankles, but for the type and style of jogger they are I don’t mind. I’m 140lbs and bought a size M. They are extremely soft and I swear I could live in these. They have a nice wide waistband that’s very comfortable and doesn’t cut into you at all. They are stretchy and forgiving; very opaque and don’t show any cellulite or anything. The pockets are great too and hold my large cell phone without dragging the pants off of me, and without the phone falling out of my pockets when I walk or move about. They don’t stretch out either and leave those unflattering stretchy knees like some other pants. I usually wear them for running errands but have also worn them to work out and they are just as stretchy and comfy as tights. Best of all they feel like butter - I’m right now ordering another pair!!

Love these. Very “buttery” soft. Functioning pockets. As a busy mom chasing a toddler while carrying a newborn, love the relaxed look of them compared to regular leggings. Will definitely recommend these to a friend.

评论概述: Amazingly just like the name brands!
评论详情: I never write reviews but I always appreciate people who do! It’s hard to know if what you’re buying online (when it’s ‘cheap’) will really be good. But I must say these are the MOST comfortable pants. So stretchy, but hold their shape. So much more affordable than other popular name brands. I own both Viori and Lululemon and these are very comparable.  The pockets are deep so phone and keys don’t fall out when you sit down. Not too big of pockets (not too much material) that makes your hips look weird and puffy. The high thicker waistband holds you in and fits flat, so tee shirts or tanks don’t bunch up. And no weird look in the crotch area. Washed well. No shrinkage although I hang to dry.  I really love these pants and my husband says they “really flatter my figure”. Gotta love that!  I tried both extra small and small and they are very close in feel, but I preferred the extra small. Less material in the hip area. I’m 5’2 110lbs.
I had a pair of comfy pants I couldn’t let go of… but really needed to let go of… couldn’t find another pair that would suffice. Until now! I want a pair in every color!
Love these joggers. I have 3 pair and they fit wonderfully and hold their shape. They wash nicely, don’t shrink. Definitely recommend

These are the best joggers on the market. The fit is great, the fabric is very nice. They don't pill or fade. You can dress them up or down. We have multiple pair, the camo is our favorite! The fit is great, they're not too baggy but not fitted either. Smooth almost shiny appearance lets us dress them up a little when we need. Slowly adding all the colors to our closet. And finding my joggers in my daughters room on the regular.

I have basically been living in these joggers since I got them - I really need to order several more pairs in some more colors! They are extremely comfortable, flattering fit. I wash them in cold water in my washing machine on regular and then air dry or tumble dry on delicate with NO HEAT if I'm in a hurry to wear them (which I always am bc again, I have basically been living in these gals) Cannot recommend enough.
These joggers are great. The material is a little slippery, but still soft, and very comfortable. I love the fit. I am going to buy some other colors.

Don’t wrinkle, ever. Wash beautifully. Can wear totally casual or a bit dressed up. I’m 4’11”, weigh 108 and got a medium. I’m happy with the fit although I could have worn a small. This is an update. I’ve gotten three pairs and love, love, love them. Medium is good for me, a little long, but I like a looser fit.

I ordered these leggings based on a review I saw on GMA. I ordered a Large, but I received a medium. Surprisingly, the medium was a great fit, comfortable, not too tight and I'm happy with them.  Not a great deal of compression. I would definitely size down.
The waistband was tighter than I expected I wear a size 12. I ordered L

评论概述: Very nice quality pants, very generously shaped
评论详情: I am about 5'2", 105#, and these pants were much too large for me. The waist was OK, and the length was doable (they were full length on me, but at my height I expect that), but the hips and legs are extremely generous. I wasn't expecting leggings, but I wanted slim tapered joggers and these weren't it. If you are small-waisted but quite curvy, which I am definitely not, you will probably like these.  The garment quality seems stellar. They are not super thick, but substantial. They are not warm or lined in any way. I think the material would be very flattering if I had the body these pants were designed for. I guess I am not shaped like a dragon.
